long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Level365 API integration platform providing database driven screen pops.  The Level365  app integrates with back-office applications using APIs (Salesforce.com, Zendesk, etc.)  By leveraging APIs the Level365 extension will search any internal database a present the findings in a new window. The CRM Connector app also recognizes any phone number presented in Google Chrome and transforms it into a clickable link for seamless click to dial.
